.. function:: This function allows the user to choose coordinates in three steps:
1. Create an action client called "move_base" with action definition file "MoveBaseAction"
2. Creates a new goal with the MoveBaseGoal constructor
3. Gets goal position from user There is also option to return to main terminal
Service : /move_base
goal: MoveBaseGoal() pose.position(float):
x= by user
y= by user
w=1
Client: /move_base (SimpleActionClient)
ability: send_goal, cancel_goal, wait_for_server, get_result
.. function::This is main function, here creat initiation node for movebase_client script and waiting for answer from user

Service: /user_interface
Client: /move_base
Description: movebase client Node: gets desired position from user and sends it to movebase node using actionlib and if the goal is not reached before timeout cancels it
